body.p: I saw McDowel shoot ^at^ Daniel, once and my impression is Twice, before Daniel drew his pistol, saw all the shooting without changing My Posision, was up in the Balconey over the Clerk's Office door, Saw Daniel down (Supposed from injury) when McD -- drew a large Colt's Pistol and was in the act of Striking when McAfee run up within 15 ft of McDowel and Shot at him. confidently believeing that it saved Daniel from a fatal blow,
Sworn to before me by George T. Keith this 26th day of September 1861
H. J. Campbell P. J. J. C. C.
